Article Title: Tragedy in Paktika! Three Afghanistan cricketers killed in attack on Pakistan border; captain Rashid Khan breaks down
Article Text:
File pic - Afghanistan cricket team (AFP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Pakistan-Afghanistan Clashes: Heavy Fighting Along Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Border, Taliban Posts Damaged

NEW DELHI: Afghanistan have withdrawn from a tri-nation series with Pakistan and Sri Lanka next month following the killing of three local cricketers in an attack, the country’s cricket board confirmed on Friday. According to the Afghanistan Cricket Board (ACB), the players had travelled from Urgun to Sharana in eastern Paktika province, near the Pakistan border, to participate in a friendly match.The ACB stated that "after returning home to Urgun, they were targeted during a gathering" in what it described as "a cowardly attack carried out by the Pakistani regime."The board identified the three players as "Kabeer, Sibghatullah and Haroon," and added that five other people were also killed in the attack. No further details about the incident were provided.The ACB said it "considers this a great loss for Afghanistan's sports community, its athletes, and the cricketing family," while extending its "deepest condolences and solidarity to the bereaved families."It added that the decision to withdraw from next month’s tri-series was made "as a gesture of respect to the victims."Afghanistan captain Rashid Khan took to social media and wrote: "I am deeply saddened by the loss of civilian lives in the recent Pakistani aerial strikes on Afghanistan.A tragedy that claimed the lives of women, children, and aspiring young cricketers who dreamed of representing their nation on the world stage.""It is absolutely immoral and barbaric to target civilian infrastructure. These unjust and unlawful actions represent a grave violation of human rights and must not go unnoticed."In light of the precious innocent souls lost, I welcome the ACB’s decision of withdrawing from upcoming fixtures against Pakistan. I stand with our people at this difficult time, our national dignity must come before all else," he wrote.Afghan international cricketer Fazalhaq Farooqi expressed his grief on social media, writing: "The massacre of innocent civilians and our domestic cricket players by these oppressors is a heinous, unforgivable crime."Another international player, Mohammad Nabi, commented: "This incident is not only a tragedy for Paktika but for the entire Afghan cricket family and the nation as a whole."
Article Summary: Afghanistan have withdrawn from a tri-nation series with pakistan and sri lanka. Three local cricketers were killed in an attack, the country’s cricket board confirmed. The players had travelled from urgun to sharana in eastern paktika province, near the pakistan border.

Article Title: WWE SmackDown Results & Highlights 17-oct-2025: Cody Rhodes shows vicious side against Drew McIntyre, Ilja Dragunov returns to win US title and more
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Opening segment with Cody Rhodes

Charlotte Flair & Alexa Bliss vs. Zaria & Sol Ruca



Sami Zayn vs. Ilja Dragunov

Motor City Machine Guns vs. Los Garza

Drew McIntyre vs. Cody Rhodes

WWE Friday Night SmackDown emanated from the SAP Center in San Jose, California this week. It was an exciting edition of the show that saw Ilja Dragunov return and immediately capture the WWE US title, an explosive tag team title match and mysterious backstage assault that led to an impromptu match between Drew McIntyre and Cody Rhodes that saw a vicious side of the American Nightmare in front of the audience.The show was opened by SmackDown GM Nick Aldis who announced that Drew McIntyre vs. Jacob Fatu will be to determine the No.1 contender for Cody Rhodes' Undisputed WWE title. Rhodes then came down to the ring and addressed his loss to Seth Rollins at WWE Crown Jewel while also speaking about The Vision betraying him. Rhodes then turned his attention to his next potential challenger setting the tone for the upcoming WWE Saturday Night's Main Event where he will defend the title.This was a tag team showdown with Charlotte Flair and Alexa Bliss defending the WWE Women's Tag Team titles against NXT stars, Zaria and Sol Ruca. The challengers posed a great challenge to the champions, and it looked like an evenly matched contest. However, Sol Ruca got distracted by Blake Monroe, who was at ringside. Flair took advantage to gain the upper hand and locked in the Figure 8 to make her tap out and retain the titles for her team.Sami Zayn, much like every week, hosted a US title Open Challenge for his championship which was answered by the returning Ilja Dragunov. Originally, The Miz came out to compete against Zayn, but Carmelo Hayes attacked him from behind at the entrance ramp. The Mad Dragon showed no signs of ring rust and brought the fight to Zayn with both men producing a stellar showdown that led the fans to erupt. In the final moments of the bout, Solo Sikoa appeared on the entrance ramp to distract Zayn. This gave Dragunov the chance to capitalize, knock down and finish Zayn with the H-bomb to win the WWE United States title. After the match, the duo, alongside Rey Fenix who came down, were attacked by the MFT, who were also confronted by The Wyatt Sicks.This was a tag team match between Alex Shelly & Chris Sabin against Angel and Berto. Both engaged in a classic tag showdown that had the fans on their feet. Following a stellar match that saw both teams go back and forth, the ending saw MCMG connect a spectacular double team move and score the pinfall to win the match.The original match between Drew McIntyre and Jacob Fatu did not take place, as Fatu was found attacked backstage. Cody Rhodes came out in his suit and immediately challenged McIntyre to a match. Both men engaged in a heated match that spilled all over the ringside area and saw Rhodes and McIntyre inflict major damage to each other. The match ended in disqualification when Rhodes hit McIntyre with the Undisputed WWE title. He was about to hit him with the Cross Rhodes on the announcer's desk before the officials came down to stop him.Also read: 'You are a stalker'- WWE superstar CM Punk does not mince words in addressing recent fan behavior
Article Summary: Wwe friday night smackdown emanated from the sap center in san jose, california this week. It was an exciting edition of the show that saw ilja dragunov return and immediately capture the wwe us title. Drew mcintyre vs. jacob fatu will be to determine the no.1 contender for cody rhodes' undisputed wwe title.

Article Title: NBA trade rumors: Golden State Warriors predicted to sign $186 million Milwaukee Bucks superstar to form Big 3 with Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler
Article Text:
Golden State Warriors guard Stephen Curry reacts during the first half of an NBA basketball preseason game against the Portland Trail Blazers, Wednesday, Oct. 8, 2025, in San Francisco. (AP Photo/Godofredo A. Vásquez)

Golden State Warriors

Milwaukee Bucks superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo

(Disclaimer: The data and analysis in this post are based on conjecture as of right now. Although the information is based on reliable sources, it's crucial to remember that these are not official declarations or verified actions. It is advised that readers use caution when interpreting this analysis and wait for official updates as the offseason progresses.)

Horror at NBA YoungBoy Show: Elderly Usher Beaten, Teen ARRESTED After Viral Video | WATCH

Golden State Warriors’ Aging Core Faces a Crossroads

The Proposed Blockbuster Deal

76ers vs Bucks (Image via Getty)

Proposed Trade Details

Team Receives Warriors Giannis Antetokounmpo Bucks Draymond Green, Moses Moody, Brandin Podziemski, Buddy Hield, two first-round picks

Why This Trade Could Work for Both Teams

Key Trade Implications

Theare reportedly exploring a blockbuster move that could redefine the franchise’s future. According to Fansided’s Matt Moore, the team may consider parting ways with long-time defensive anchor Draymond Green to acquire- a player with a massive $175 million contract and generational talent.After a quiet offseason, the Golden State Warriors ’ biggest addition has been veteran forward Al Horford, making them one of the oldest teams in NBA history. Despite that, the front office remains confident that Stephen Curry can still lead the franchise to another deep playoff run.The organization is reportedly waiting until midseason to determine whether this current roster can keep pace with the Western Conference elite. If they prove competitive, major trade talks could intensify before the deadline.“You fundamentally reshape your entire future instead of trying to sneak out one more title. It buys you time to reconfigure and extend your success and avoid a post-Steph rebuild,” Matt Moore said Monday. (H/t: Sporting News)Moore’s statement highlights what could be a defining moment for Golden State - choosing between loyalty to its core and building for the next era.Moore’s trade scenario involves the Golden State Warriors sending several key assets to Milwaukee in exchange for Giannis Antetokounmpo This trade would mean Golden State parting with a franchise icon and its young depth - a steep price even for a two-time MVP. However, pairing Giannis with Curry could immediately catapult the Golden State Warriors back into title contention.The addition of stretch big men like Quinten Post and Al Horford gives the Golden State Warriors more spacing than in previous seasons, allowing Giannis to dominate inside without clogging the floor. His explosive playstyle could perfectly complement Curry’s perimeter shooting, creating one of the most dynamic duos in NBA history.For Milwaukee, the move represents a potential reset. The Bucks have struggled recently despite Giannis’s brilliance, and a package featuring young talents like Moody and Podziemski, along with multiple first-round picks, offers a clear path toward rebuilding.• For the Warriors: A chance to extend their championship window beyond the Curry era• For the Bucks: Long-term assets and flexibility to reshape their roster• For Draymond Green: The possible end of a legendary run with Golden StateTrading Draymond Green - a four-time champion and defensive cornerstone - would be one of the toughest decisions in franchise history. Yet as Moore points out, “You can’t justify moving one of your franchise icons for almost any player. Giannis is not just any player.”Should the trade be completed, it would both end an era and start a new one centered on Giannis Antetokounmpo and Stephen Curry. Additionally, it would be remembered as one of the most significant moves in NBA history.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Golden State Warriors Could Limit $8.6 Million Star’s Minutes as Veteran Core Takes Priority in New Season The Golden State Warriors’ front office faces a defining test this season: stay loyal to a proven core or risk it all for a once-in-a-generation superstar. Whether or not the deal happens, the idea itself signals that Golden State is not ready to fade quietly into a rebuild.
Article Summary: The golden state warriors are reportedly exploring a blockbuster move that could redefine the franchise’s future. The team may consider parting ways with long-time defensive anchor draymond green to acquire- a player with a massive $175 million contract and generational talent. For milwaukee, the move represents a potential reset.

Article Title: George Kittle injury update: 49ers Star tight end set for Week 7 return; Surgeon flags re-injury risk
Article Text:
George Kittle set for Week 7 return amid injury concerns (Image via: Getty Images)

San Francisco 49ers’ George Kittle set for Week 7 comeback after Hamstring injury

What George Kittle’s comeback means for 49ers

George Kittle excited to return from hamstring injury for 49ers-Falcons game | NBC Sports Bay Area

The San Francisco 49ers sit at 4-2, but they’ve been without star tight end George Kittle since Week 1. The Pro Bowler tore his right hamstring against the Seattle Seahawks and has missed five games. Recent updates, including medical clearance for practice, signal that Kittle could return soon, bringing hope for a much-needed boost to the 49ers’ offense.Harvard-trained sports surgeon Dr. Deepak Chona recently provided an encouraging update on George Kittle’s recovery, stating that both Kittle and Tampa Bay Buccaneers receiver Mike Evans are likely to return to pre-injury form within one to two weeks. However, Chona also warned that Kittle faces a “high re-injury risk given age and history,” which is a concern considering his previous injuries.Kittle’s injury occurred after 22 snaps in Week 1, with just over ten minutes left in the second quarter. He was immediately placed on injured reserve, forcing him to miss five straight games — his longest absence since 2020, when he missed eight games due to knee and foot injuries. According to NFL rules, players placed on injured reserve must miss a minimum of four games, which made Kittle eligible to return in Week 6.However, the 49ers opted to give him extra recovery time.This week, Kittle was cleared for a 21-day practice window, signaling his possible return against the Atlanta Falcons in Week 7. He participated in limited practice sessions on Wednesday and Thursday, showing promising progress. Speaking to reporters, Kittle sounded eager to rejoin the team: “I fully plan on playing on Sunday. As long as Kyle lets me. It’s up to him. But hopefully I’m out there.” Head coach Kyle Shanahan echoed that optimism, confirming that Kittle’s return is “the hope. ”Kittle’s comeback brings both excitement and tough decisions for the 49ers. His return energizes the locker room, with quarterback Mac Jones praising his leadership and infectious energy. However, it also forces San Francisco to reevaluate its offensive lineup, especially with ongoing injuries to key players like Fred Warner, Marquez Valdes-Scantling, and Ricky Pearsall.Kittle’s impending return presents a crucial decision for the 49ers — whether to accelerate his comeback to reignite their offense or adopt a cautious approach to prevent another setback. Either way, his presence could be the key to restoring balance and momentum as San Francisco enters the heart of the season.Also Read: CeeDee Lamb injury update: Cowboys’ Star WR on track for Week 7 against Washington Commanders
Article Summary: The san francisco 49ers have been without star tight end george kittle since week 1. The pro bowler tore his right hamstring against the seattle seahawks and has missed five games. Kittle was cleared for a 21-day practice window, signaling his possible return against the atlanta falcons in week 7.

Article Title: Who is Shannon Kobylarczyk? Here’s what you need to know about the Milwaukee Brewers fan controversy that cost her a job
Article Text:
Shannon Kobylarczyk. Image via: Ricardo Fosado | X

Who is Shannon Kobylarczyk?



Milwaukee Brewers 'Karen' Fired By Employer After 'Racist' Rant Against LA Dodgers Fan Goes Viral

Exploring Shannon Kobylarczyk's controversy



Did Shannon Kobylarczyk lose her job?



What did MLB say about the Shannon Kobylarczyk controversy?



The Milwaukee Brewers’ National League Championship Series clash with the Los Angeles Dodgers took a sharp turn off the field when a video from Game 2 went viral for all the wrong reasons. A heated exchange between Brewers fan Shannon Kobylarczyk and Dodgers supporter Ricardo Fosado turned into a national talking point after Kobylarczyk was seen making a racially charged remark. Within days, she lost her job, resigned from a charitable board, and was banned from American Family Field.Shannon Kobylarczyk, a Milwaukee-based attorney, worked at ManpowerGroup, a global staffing firm, and also served on the Make-A-Wish Wisconsin board of directors. Until last week, she was largely unknown outside professional circles. That changed during Game 2 of the NLCS on October 14, when she became the center of an online firestorm.The game, played in Milwaukee, had started as a typical postseason battle — the Brewers took an early lead before the Dodgers surged ahead. Amid the excitement, Fosado, a Los Angeles fan and U.S. Navy veteran, began recording the crowd’s reaction after a Dodgers home run.In his clip, Kobylarczyk can be heard mocking him, yelling, “Real men drink beer, p***y!” Moments later, she tapped another fan and said, “You know what, let’s call ICE. ”Fosado, calm but defiant, replied, “Call ICE. Call ICE. I’m a U.S. citizen, war veteran, baby girl. War veteran, two wars. ICE is not gonna do nothing to me. Good luck.”The exchange escalated, leading to Fosado’s removal from the stadium after Kobylarczyk reported him to security. However, the story didn’t end there, it was only beginning.The viral video, viewed more than 2 million times, quickly drew outrage online. Many criticized Kobylarczyk for using an anti-immigrant remark, especially toward a Latino veteran. The Brewers soon confirmed that both fans were banned from American Family Field due to “offensive statements” and “physical confrontation.”In a statement, the team said, “The Brewers expect all persons attending games to be respectful of each other, and we do not condone in any way offensive statements fans make to each other about race, gender, or national origin.” They emphasized their commitment to maintaining a “safe and enjoyable experience” for all fans.The fallout was swift. ManpowerGroup announced that Kobylarczyk had been placed on leave and later terminated. “As soon as we became aware of this video the individual was placed on immediate leave and we began an investigation,” the company said. “As a result of this process, the employee is no longer with the organization. We remain committed to maintaining a culture grounded in respect, integrity, and accountability. ”She also resigned from Make-A-Wish Wisconsin’s board. The nonprofit confirmed, “Shannon Kobylarczyk resigned from our board of directors this afternoon effective immediately. Make-A-Wish Wisconsin does not condone nor agree with Kobylarczyk’s words and actions.”Major League Baseball and the Brewers shared that such behavior violates league standards. The Milwaukee Police Department also became involved, citing Fosado for disorderly conduct and intoxication, though he wasn’t charged. Both fans, the Brewers said, are barred “from returning to the ballpark for future events.”Interestingly, Fosado himself showed grace toward Kobylarczyk despite the confrontation. Speaking to the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel, he said, “I don’t think it was like horrible or something that should get her fired. I feel bad for her. We cannot be judged on one mistake, and a lot of emotions were involved.”For Fosado, the night ended on a surprisingly positive note. “This is my first time at a Brewers game and I got kicked out, but you know what? I had a great experience and everybody was really friendly and welcoming,” he said.The viral moment dubbed Kobylarczyk “Brewers Karen” online.Also Read: Brewers 'Karen' fired after viral video identifies her as Shannon Kobylarczyk in racist rant at Dodgers supporter and U.S. war veteran
Article Summary: Shannon kobylarczyk, a milwaukee-based attorney, worked at manpowergroup, a global staffing firm. She lost her job, resigned from a charitable board, and was banned from american family field. A video from game 2 of the national league championship series between the milwaukee brewers and the los angeles dodgers went viral.

Article Title: Connor McDavid’s net worth in 2025: A look at the NHL star's salary, endorsements, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
McDavid continues to reign as one of hockey’s all-time greats, recently achieving his 1,000th NHL point (Image via: Getty Images)

Connor McDavid’s net worth and salary in 2025

Connor McDavid’s endorsements in 2025

Connor McDavid’s NHL career and captaincy with the Edmonton Oilers

Also read

Connor McDavid, the 28-year-old ice hockey center and captain for the Edmonton Oilers, is one of the most promising players in the NHL . He is currently at the helm of the captaincy of the Edmonton Oilers in the NHL. Connor McDavid has won three Hart Memorial Trophies and is recognized for his impressive performances in the NHL.According to the NHL, McDavid dazzled scouts with extraordinary acceleration and high-end speed, uncanny on-ice vision, and a seemingly endless array of moves. This led the Oilers to select him first overall in the 2015 NHL Draft. McDavid has recently proved why he is widely regarded as the best hockey player in the world, as the Edmonton Oilers superstar reached a top skating speed of 39.61 kilometers per hour, making him the fastest player in the NHL.According to Bolavip, the net worth of the ice hockey center for the Edmonton Oilers , Connor McDavid, is $30 million as of November 2024. In 2017, he agreed on an 8-year contract of $100 million with the Edmonton Oilers. His base salary is $3 million, and he received a signing bonus of $7 million. Further, in the year 2023-24, he received $11 million with a 14.97% cap, and in the years 2024-25 and 2025-26, McDavid received $10 million and a 14.20% cap and 13.09% cap, respectively.In addition to his on-ice earnings, Connor McDavid enjoys a lucrative portfolio of endorsements that significantly boost his annual income. McDavid’s major brand partnerships include Alo Yoga, BetMGM, BodyArmor, and Rogers Communications. These deals collectively contribute around $5 million per year to his overall earnings. McDavid’s association with BodyArmor began after he switched from BioSteel in 2024, highlighting his growing appeal beyond hockey.McDavid signed an eight-year, $100 million contract with the Oilers on July 5, 2017, and repeated as NHL scoring champion in 2017-18, when he had 108 points (41 goals, 67 assists) in 82 games, and won the Ted Lindsay Award. He redefined modern hockey since joining the Edmonton Oilers. Despite missing 37 games in his rookie season due to injury, the teenage phenom dazzled with 48 points in 45 games, immediately proving he could exceed the immense hype.In 2016–17, McDavid led the NHL with 100 points, capturing both the Hart Trophy as MVP and the Ted Lindsay Award, while guiding Edmonton to its first playoff berth in a decade. He has since become the League’s most dominant offensive force, earning multiple Art Ross, Lindsay, and Hart trophies.In 2024, he broke Wayne Gretzky’s record for most assists in a single postseason and earned the Conn Smythe Trophy despite Edmonton’s Finals loss. As captain, McDavid has restored the Oilers’ relevance; he continues to lead the team. With each record and dazzling performance, he solidifies his place alongside the legends of the NHL game.
Article Summary: Connor mcdavid, 28, is the captain of the edmonton oilers in the nhl. He has won three hart memorial trophies and is recognized for his impressive performances. In 2017, he agreed on an 8-year contract of $100 million with the oilers. His base salary is $3 million, and he received a signing bonus of $7 million.

Article Title: “Real legacy stuff”: Joe Flacco’s lesson for his kids after being traded from Cleveland Browns to Cincinnati Bengals
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Joe Flacco)

Joe Flacco’s post-win press conference has lessons for his four children

A reporter asked Flacco:

Flacco’s answer:

Fans shower praises of appreciation for the 40-year-old quarterback

(Comments via X post on Joe Flacco)

Joe Flacco stats with Cincinnati Bengals

With Cleveland Browns

Donald Trump ’s “elite quarterback” praise resurfaces amidst Steelers vs Bengals matchup

Also Read:

At the post-win conference, a reporter asked Cincinnati Bengals' newest quarterback Joe Flacco, “When you look at this 11-day stretch one day down the road, what lesson do you hope it teaches your kids?” His reply included valuable lessons for his four children—“Take on some challenges” and “You can’t worry about the outcome. ” That’s what he did with himself. After being traded from the Cleveland Browns 11 days ago, he took up every challenge he faced as a football player, as a competitor, and gave his 100% and look where he’s at now—from a 39.3 passer rating against the Detroit Lions as a Cleveland Brown to a 108.6 passer rating against the Pittsburgh Steelers as a Cincinnati Bengal. Listening to his answer, one fan wrote, “Leading on and off the field that’s real legacy stuff from Flacco ❤️👏.”The NFL ’s official X account shared the veteran quarterback’s video interview with a perfect caption: “.@JoeFlacco on being an example for his children ❤️.”When you look at this 11-day stretch one day down the road, what less do you hope it teaches your kids?Well, I think one of the biggest things is that hopefully they’ll be willing to take on challenges, you know, cause I think it would have been easy to maybe say—Naah, I don’t wanna do that like you want me to play this week, you know, I don’t know.I think that’s one thing—to take on some challenges and you can’t worry about the outcome, you know. I see myself as a competitor, I see myself as a football player—that’s what I do. That the challenge? Okay, fine, let me take it on. I see myself as a football player first. No hesitation. Let’s go do this.One hearing Flacco’s advice for his four children, one fan wrote, “He better be a first ballot hall of famer once he's done and hall of Fame for Father's too.” Another praised the signal-caller, saying, “Love this wisdom from Joe. Can apply it to any part of life.” A third fan found Flacco happy like never before: “I loved his interview after the game with the Prime crew! He was so happy. Don't remember the last time he was so effusive. Great job @JoeFlacco 🧡🖤 #WhoDey.” A fourth fan chimed in, “This is a great interview. Listened to the whole thing. He seems like a great genuine person.” A fifth fan wondered, “How could anyone hate this man.”Total games—2Completion %—65.2Total yards—561Touchdowns—5Interceptions—0Rating—100.0Total games—4Completion %—58.1Total yards—815Touchdowns—2Interceptions—6Rating—60.3Back in 2015, US President Donald Trump shared a video recording of an #AskTrump session where he was asked, “Do you think Joe Flacco is an elite quarterback?” Trump replied, saying, “I think Joe Flacco is actually a very elite quarterback. He won a Super Bowl; he did it, really, to a certain extent with that great arm of his. I would say absolutely, he is an elite quarterback.” No wonder it’s going viral now.
Article Summary: Joe flacco was traded from the cleveland browns to the cincinnati bengals 11 days ago. A reporter asked flacco, “when you look at this 11-day stretch one day down the road, what lesson do you hope it teaches your kids?” his reply included valuable lessons for his four children: “take on some challenges” and “you can’t worry about the outcome.”

Article Title: Falcons WR Ray-Ray McCloud sent home amid private matter, insider claims disagreement with coach behind absence
Article Text:
(Image via Getty)

Falcons’ wide receiver Ray-Ray McCloud’s sudden absence raises eyebrows

Insider claims McCloud’s benching may be tied to Ike Hilliard firing and locker room tension

“words were likely exchanged that probably shouldn’t have been said,”

What McCloud’s absence could mean for his Falcons future

Just when Atlanta Falcons fans thought they’d seen all the drama this season, wide receiver Ray-Ray McCloud has been sent home, and nobody knows when or if he’ll return. Head coach Raheem Morris confirmed Friday that McCloud’s absence is excused, calling it a “private matter”, leaving fans speculating about what’s really going on behind the scenes.McCloud’s departure from team activities comes amid a season of ups and downs. The 27-year-old was a healthy scratch in Week 6 against the Buffalo Bills, hinting at a reduced role in the Falcons’ offense compared to his career-best 2024 performance.HC Raheem Morris emphasized that the situation is unrelated to recent coaching changes, including the firing of former wide receivers coach Ike Hilliard. Still, the timing has sparked questions about McCloud’s role on the roster and whether the Falcons are prepared for his absence on special teams and in the passing game.The insider, who has previously leaked accurate Falcons information, claims McCloud’s recent benching could be linked to the firing of former wide receivers coach Ike Hilliard. Apparently, McCloud had a disagreement with Morris following the coaching shake-up, andwhich may have led to a disciplinary benching.Fans have already noticed McCloud looking less than thrilled celebrating in the locker room while his teammates cheered, adding fuel to the speculation that internal tension is at play.If true, this insider intel adds a new layer of drama to McCloud’s season.Analysts have also weighed in, noting that McCloud’s versatility as a slot receiver and special teams ace makes him a valuable asset, and missing him even temporarily could impact Atlanta’s short-term game plan.McCloud’s situation remains a mystery, and the lack of a clear return timeline keeps the speculation machine running. After a strong 2024 season, where he contributed significantly in both receiving and return duties, his future with the team is now uncertain.Between the private matter, insider claims about locker room tension, and the speculation surrounding his benching, McCloud’s absence has become one of the NFL ’s juiciest off-field stories. Fans, analysts, and teammates will be watching closely to see when or if he returns to the Falcons lineup.Also read - “They can’t do sh*t”: Bill Belichick and Jordon Hudson caught trash talking in a leaked hot-mic
Article Summary: Atlanta falcons wide receiver ray-ray mccloud has been sent home, and nobody knows when or if he’ll return. Head coach raheem morris confirmed friday that mccloud’s absence is excused, calling it a “private matter” an insider claims mccloud had a disagreement with morris following the coaching shake-up, andwhich may have led to a disciplinary benching.

Article Title: Justin Herbert and Madison Beer: 2025’s Hottest new couple striking the perfect balance everyone’s talking about
Article Text:
Justin Herbert and Madison Beer are pure couple goals (Image via: Twitter)

Justin Herbert and Madison Beer : The romance everyone’s talking about



Madison Beer’s style spotlight: From Victoria’s Secret runway to Off-Duty street chic

Why fans are obsessed with Justin Herbert and Madison Beer



Justin Herbert and Madison Beer have quickly become one of 2025’s most talked-about couples. Rumors of their romance started in August when Herbert was spotted at one of Beer’s music video shoots in Los Angeles. Since then, every public sighting and viral moment has fueled speculation, making them a hot topic across sports and entertainment.The couple’s connection became more visible when they were seen together at a friend’s gathering in August and photographed holding hands in September. On October 5, their relationship was confirmed during a viral moment at the Chargers’ game against the Washington Commanders, where Beer hugged and kissed Herbert on the sidelines.Despite the public attention, Herbert remains private, telling ESPN, “I think the less people know about me, the better.” Their romance perfectly combines two high-profile worlds: Beer’s global pop music influence and Herbert’s NFL stardom, creating a balance that fans can’t stop talking about.After performing at the 2025 Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show, Justin Herbert’s girlfriend, Madison Beer, turned heads with her signature off-duty style.She paired a classic black leather jacket with a white button-down sweater, sleek black boots, and jeans. The boots, featuring a rounded square toe and mid-height block heel, were tucked neatly under her jeans—a styling choice also seen on celebrities like Katie Holmes and Charli XCX.At the Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show at Steiner Studios, Brooklyn, Beer performed “Bittersweet” in René Caovilla thigh-high boots, blending stage-ready glamour with high-fashion sophistication. Whether on the runway or off-stage, Beer effortlessly balances statement pieces with casual styling, reinforcing her status as a trendsetter in 2025 while keeping her relationship with Justin Herbert in the spotlight.Justin Herbert and Madison Beer’s romance continues to capture attention. Their combination of viral moments, stylish appearances, and high-profile careers makes them one of 2025’s most fascinating couples. Fans and media alike are constantly following their every move, making them a trending topic across sports and entertainment.Whether on NFL sidelines or through Madison Beer’s fashion highlights, the couple demonstrates the perfect balance of love, privacy, and style. Their chemistry and public presence have solidified them as 2025’s hottest new duo, inspiring conversations about celebrity relationships and modern romance.Also Read: Justin Herbert’s beau Madison Beer shows off bold lemon-yellow weekend look in mirror selfie while vibing to her recent track “Bittersweet”
Article Summary: Justin herbert and madison beer have quickly become one of 2025’s most talked-about couples. Rumors of their romance started in august when herbert was spotted at a music video shoot. On october 5, their relationship was confirmed during a viral moment at the chargers’ game against the washington commanders.

Article Title: What really happened to former NFL star Larry Williams? The untold story behind USF director's sudden death at 62
Article Text:
Former NFL player and University of San Francisco athletic director Larry Williams died suddenly during a morning workout (Image via Getty)

Larry Williams’ faith, football legacy, and lasting impact across college athletics



Sports world reacts to the sudden death of Larry Williams

Larry Williams, a former NFL offensive lineman and athletic director at the University of San Francisco, died on Thursday morning during a workout on campus. He was 62.According to university president Salvador D. Aceves, Williams collapsed while exercising at the War Memorial Gym. “Our prayers go out to Larry’s wife, Laura, their children, Kristin, Sean, Scott, Eric, and Louis, their families, and his grandchildren,” Aceves said in a letter to the university community. “My thoughts and prayers also go to the university’s 250 student-athletes and all of the coaches and staff under Larry’s skillful watch.”Williams had been the school’s athletic director since 2022. No official cause of death has been released, though local reports cited a possible heart-related incident.Before becoming an administrator, Larry Williams built a strong football career rooted in faith and discipline. A California native, Williams was a two-time All-American at Notre Dame before being drafted by the Cleveland Browns in the 10th round of the 1985 NFL Draft. He went on to play 61 games with 44 starts over seven seasons, spending time with the Browns, New Orleans Saints, and New England Patriots.While playing professionally, he earned a law degree from the University of San Diego, later practicing law in Indianapolis before shifting toward leadership in college athletics.Williams became the athletic director at the University of Portland in 2004, then at Marquette University, followed by the University of Akron, and finally the University of San Francisco in 2022.When hired by USF, Williams said the role aligned perfectly with his beliefs. “USF represents to me the almost perfect combination of things I cherish,” he explained. “No. 1, it’s the Catholic identity. No. 2, it’s the deep educational mission. And No. 3, it’s athletic participation in an environment that very specifically includes 1 and 2. At this point in my career, there’s almost a vocational element to what I do here at USF. ”Tributes poured in across college and professional football. Notre Dame Football posted, “We are deeply saddened by the passing of Larry Williams. We send our condolences to his family and friends.”Marquette University described him as a “strong, committed leader whose passion for the holistic development of student-athletes left a lasting mark on collegiate athletics.”Journalist Pete Thamel called the news “crushing,” adding, “Larry was smart, engaging, and fun to talk with because he thought outside the box. He had great perspective as a former star player in college and the NFL.”Williams is survived by his wife, Laura, five children, and several grandchildren. Stephanie Shrieve-Hawkins has been appointed interim athletic director at USF.
Article Summary: Former nfl player and university of san francisco athletic director larry williams died suddenly during a morning workout. No official cause of death has been released, though local reports cited a possible heart-related incident. Williams was a two-time all-american at notre dame before being drafted by the cleveland browns in the 10th round of the 1985 nfl draft.

Article Title: Auston Matthews got the goal, but these Leafs players stole Thursday night in 2-1 OT win over Rangers
Article Text:
Auston Matthews, Matthew Knies and Anthony Stolarz vs Rangers (Image via: Getty Images)

Auston Matthews, Matthew Knies, and Anthony Stolarz lead Leafs to OT win



Auston Matthews

Matthew Knies

Anthony Stolarz

New York Rangers at Toronto Maple Leafs | FULL Overtime Highlights - October 16, 2025

Toronto looks to maintain momentum in upcoming clash with Kraken



Toronto Maple Leafs pulled off a dramatic 2-1 overtime victory against the New York Rangers on Thursday night at Scotiabank Arena. Auston Matthews scored the decisive goal, but standout performances from Matthew Knies and goalie Anthony Stolarz proved crucial in securing Toronto’s third win of the season.Toronto’s top performers delivered in style, helping the Leafs secure a hard-fought 2-1 overtime victory against the New York Rangers. Each player played a crucial role in keeping the team competitive and sealing the win.Captain Auston Matthews once again proved why he is a cornerstone of the Leafs. In overtime, Matthews scored the decisive goal, showcasing his offensive skill and composure under pressure. Beyond the goal, he made crucial defensive plays, won important faceoffs, and supported his teammates throughout the game. Matthews’ leadership and all-around contributions were instrumental in securing the overtime victory.Matthew Knies opened the scoring for the Leafs, giving Toronto an early boost. Using sharp positioning and quick decision-making, Knies converted a key setup to put the team ahead. He played significant minutes, contributed defensively, and registered multiple shots on goal. Knies’ overall performance demonstrated why he is emerging as one of the Maple Leafs’ most valuable players this season.Goalie Anthony Stolarz stole the show last night, stopping 28 of 29 shots and keeping the Rangers from taking the lead. His quick reflexes and clutch saves, including multiple point-blank stops, gave Toronto the chance to push the game into overtime. Stolarz’s standout performance highlighted the Leafs’ depth in goal and his value as a reliable last line of defense.Toronto will face the Seattle Kraken on Saturday night at Scotiabank Arena, aiming to build on their overtime success against the Rangers. With Auston Matthews, Matthew Knies, and Anthony Stolarz performing at high levels, the Leafs are demonstrating early-season consistency and resilience. Maintaining focus and executing on both ends of the ice will be key as Toronto looks to continue their strong start in the 2025 NHL campaign.Also Read: Toronto Maple Leafs face tough 2025-26 start: Goalie Anthony Stolarz bears key role without Mitch Marner
Article Summary: Toronto maple leafs beat the new york rangers 2-1 in overtime on thursday night. Auston matthews scored the decisive goal, but standout performances from matthew knies and goalie anthony stolarz proved crucial in securing toronto’s third win of the season. Toronto will face the seattle kraken on saturday night.

Article Title: Los Angeles Lakers vs Golden State Warriors preseason game injury report: Who's playing, who's out, and more (October 17, 2025)
Article Text:
LA Clipers James Harden vs GS Warriors Stephen Curry (Image via Getty).

Los Angeles Clippers

Golden State Warriors

Golden State Warriors Injury Report vs Los Angeles Clippers (October 17, 2025)

LA Clippers in a Game (Image via Getty)

Los Angeles Clippers Injury Report vs Golden State Warriors (October 17, 2025)

What to Expect From Tonight's Los Angeles Clippers vs Golden State Warriors Game (October 17, 2025)

Warriors vs Clippers (Image via Getty)

Where to Watch the Los Angeles Lakers vs Golden State Warriors Game Tonight (October 17, 2025)?

Theandwill meet for their final preseason matchup on October 17, 2025, at Chase Center - but both teams are entering this contest short-handed. With the regular season just days away, this game is more about rhythm and readiness than rivalry. Coaches Steve Kerr and Tyronn Lue are both prioritizing player health and rotation balance over final scores. Golden State Warriors ’ depth will once again be put to the test as they close out the preseason. Jimmy Butler, the team’s marquee midseason acquisition from last year, headlines the injury list after suffering an ankle injury during practice earlier this week. He’s been listed as doubtful for the matchup, though an MRI revealed no structural damage. The Golden State Warriors expect Butler to be ready for their regular-season opener against the Los Angeles Lakers on October 21.Before the setback, Butler averaged 10.5 points, 3 rebounds, and 2.5 assists while shooting 60% from the field in two preseason games. Kerr emphasized that there’s no rush to bring him back, noting Butler’s excellent conditioning and confirming that he’ll resume ramp-up workouts over the weekend.The Golden State Warriors will also be without Moses Moody, who continues to recover from a calf strain suffered earlier in the month. He hasn’t appeared since early October but should be available for opening night. Draymond Green is expected to rest, while Seth Curry remains listed as day-to-day for non-injury reasons.With several veterans sidelined, Golden State will rely on its younger players. Jonathan Kuminga, Brandin Podziemski, and rookie Alex Toohey - who missed the last game for rest - are expected to see expanded roles tonight.The Los Angeles Clippers , meanwhile, are managing their own absences. Head coach Tyronn Lue has confirmed that Kawhi Leonard and James Harden will not play, purely as a rest precaution before the regular season. Both stars have performed well in preseason action, and Lue’s decision is centered on preserving their fitness and avoiding unnecessary risk.Bradley Beal continues to sit out with knee soreness, while Bogdan Bogdanovic remains unavailable due to lower back tightness. These absences will open the door for young and fringe players to step up, including Amir Coffey and John Collins. Collins, a recent addition to the roster, has filled in admirably for Ivica Zubac in recent games.When healthy, the Los Angeles Clippers have looked sharp. Kawhi Leonard, in particular, impressed earlier this week with 17 points in the first half against the Denver Nuggets. Still, Coach Lue is keeping his focus on conditioning and chemistry rather than results.With several top names out, tonight’s game is expected to be a proving ground for bench players and young talent. For Golden State, the emphasis will be on assessing how Kuminga and Podziemski handle expanded offensive responsibilities and lead the second unit. The Los Angeles Clippers will likely turn to Zubac, Norman Powell, and Terance Mann to anchor their rotation and provide veteran stability.Fans shouldn’t expect a playoff-caliber showdown - instead, this will be a strategic tune-up for both sides, allowing coaching staffs to finalize rotations and ensure readiness for the 2025–26 regular season. The real victory for both teams will be emerging from this game healthy and prepared for opening night.With Jimmy Butler and Kawhi Leonard both sidelined, the spotlight shifts to the supporting casts. This preseason finale serves as a platform for role players and hopefuls to make one last statement before the real competition begins next week.The Los Angeles Clippers vs. Golden State Warriors preseason game on October 17, 2025, tips off at 10:00 p.m. EST (7:30 a.m. IST on October 18) at Chase Center. Fans in the San Francisco Bay Area can watch the broadcast on NBC Sports Bay Area, while viewers in Los Angeles can tune in via NBC Sports California.Also read: Is Stephen Curry playing tonight against the Los Angeles Clippers? Latest update on the Golden State Warriors stars injury report (October 17, 2025) For fans watching online, the game will be available to stream on Amazon Prime Video, NBA League Pass, and fuboTV - all of which require paid subscriptions. Select preseason matchups, including this one, may also air on regional sports networks and be available through streaming platforms such as YouTube TV and DIRECTV Stream, provided those services carry the appropriate channels.
Article Summary: The golden state warriors and los angeles clippers will meet for their final preseason matchup on october 17, 2025, at chase center. Jimmy butler and kawhi leonard are both out for the warriors, while bradley beal and bogdan bogdanovic remain out. The game is expected to be a proving ground for bench players and young talent.

Article Title: 'I might give him a call': Ajit Agarkar breaks silence on Mohammed Shami controversy
Article Text:
Ajit Agarkar addressed Mohammed Shami’s comments regarding his fitness and availability for Bengal in Ranji Trophy matches. (Image credit: Agencies)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

NEW DELHI: BCCI chief selector Ajit Agarkar has responded to Mohammed Shami 's recent criticism over being left out of India’s white-ball tour of Australia. Agarkar addressed Shami’s comments regarding his fitness and availability for Bengal in Ranji Trophy matches.Shami, who last represented India in the Champions Trophy and was the country’s joint highest wicket-taker alongside Varun Chakravarthy, has been managing ankle and knee injuries that required surgery following the 2023 World Cup.The fast bowler had voiced his displeasure over the selection snub, stating that his participation in the Ranji Trophy proved his fitness and that it wasn’t his responsibility to update the selection committee.Responding to Shami’s remarks, Agarkar said: “If he says that to me, I will probably answer that. I mean if he was here, I would probably do that. I am not quite sure what he said on social media. Maybe if I read that, I might give him a call but my phone is always on for most players. I have had multiple chats with him over the last few months, but I don't want to try and give you a headline here.”Agarkar further elaborated: “He has been an incredible performer for India.If he said something, maybe that is a conversation for me to have with him or him to have with me. But even before England, we said if he was fit, he would have been on that plane. Unfortunately, he wasn't. Our domestic season has just started so we will see if he is fit enough and we will see where it goes. This is the first round of Ranji games that is going on. We will find out in a couple of more games. If he is bowling well, why would you not want to have someone like a Shami. But what we have found in the last six-eight months to a year, even during the Australia tour, we were desperate to have him on, but unfortunately his fitness wasn't there. If he does stay fit over the next few months, the story might be different. But at this point, as far as I know, he wasn't fit enough for that England tour.”India’s upcoming tour of Australia, beginning October 19, features three ODIs and a five-match T20I series. The tour will also mark the return of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli to international cricket, their first appearance since the 2025 Champions Trophy final in March.
Article Summary: Ajit agarkar has responded to mohammed shami's criticism over being left out of india’s white-ball tour of australia. The fast bowler had voiced his displeasure over the selection snub, stating that his participation in the ranji trophy proved his fitness and that it wasn’t his responsibility to update the selection committee.

Article Title: 'Jiya ho bihar ke lala': Vaibhav Suryavanshi wins hearts with his 'beautiful' gesture to fans in Patna - WATCH
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Vaibhav Suryavanshi, 14, watches in awe as Yashasvi Jaiswal celebrates century

NEW DELHI: Vaibhav Suryavanshi’s fan base is growing at an astonishing pace. Wherever the teenage sensation plays, crowds gather in anticipation of his batting fireworks — and the youngster rarely disappoints. He also makes sure to acknowledge the love he receives. A perfect example came during Bihar’s recent Ranji Trophy clash against Arunachal Pradesh at the Moin-ul-Haq Stadium in Patna.After Bihar’s innings-and-165-run victory, hundreds of fans waited eagerly near the stands, hoping to catch a glimpse of their hometown hero. The 14-year-old prodigy walked towards the boundary ropes after the match, smiling and waving at the supporters who greeted him with loud cheers and chants. The stadium echoed with the tune of “Jai ho Bihar ke lala,” as Suryavanshi responded to the applause with folded hands.Playing his first Ranji Trophy match of the 2025 season, the left-handed batter couldn’t make a big score this time — dismissed for 14 by Arunachal’s Yab Niya — but the excitement around him was undiminished. Bihar have named Suryavanshi vice-captain for their first two matches this season, with Sakibul Gani leading the side.Watch the video here Bihar, relegated to the Plate Group after a winless campaign last season, are banking on young talents like Suryavanshi to script a turnaround. The Patna-born cricketer made his Ranji debut at just 12 during the 2023–24 season and has since risen rapidly through the ranks.At 13, he became the youngest player to earn an Indian Premier League (IPL) contract when Rajasthan Royals picked him ahead of the 2025 season. He went on to smash a 35-ball century against Gujarat Titans — the second-fastest hundred in IPL history — becoming the youngest male cricketer ever to score a T20 century at 14.Suryavanshi may not feature for Bihar throughout the season as he is expected to be in contention for India’s Under-19 World Cup squad, set to tour Zimbabwe and Namibia early next year.
Article Summary: Vaibhav suryavanshi made his ranji debut at just 12 during the 2023–24 season. At 13, he became the youngest player to earn an indian premier league (ipl) contract when rajasthan royals picked him ahead of the 2025 season. Bihar, relegated to the plate group after a winless campaign last season, are banking on young talents like suryvanshi to script a turnaround.

Article Title: 'I can’t wear a Rs 3 lakh watch around my friends': Varun Chakravarthy’s heartfelt confession
Article Text:
DUBAI, UNITED ARAB EMIRATES - SEPTEMBER 24: Varun Chakravarthy of India warms up ahead of the Asia Cup match between India and Bangladesh at Dubai International Stadium on September 24, 2025 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. (Photo by Francois Nel/Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

'Spartan mentality!': Varun Chakaravarthy reveals Gautam Gambhir's ruthless mindset with Team India

Poll Do you believe expensive luxury items can create guilt among individuals from a middle-class background? Yes, definitely No, not really

Indian spinner Varun Chakravarthy opened up about his relationship with money, revealing how he struggles with the guilt of spending on luxury items. He admitted that his typical middle-class mindset has made him acutely aware of money’s power."I have had my struggle with money," he said on Breakfast with Champions."The only investments I knew were FDs (fixed deposits). My typical middle-class mindset. I know how powerful money is. If something is very powerful, you will have to use it to its full potential.""What I feel is, rather than just changing my lifestyle with money, you can change someone else’s life — that’s more powerful."The 34-year-old spinner shared a story of buying an expensive watch."I have this guilty feeling that if I spend so much, if I have a watch worth Rs 30 lakh or 40 lakh, that amount of money actually can change someone’s life for two or three generations."One watch I bought, which was around three lakhs or something, that itself just killed me from within. I know there are people who buy more expensive stuff."See, the guys I have grown up with, some of them are still delivering food and doing all those things. I can't even imagine wearing something like that and going to meet them. I just feel that I am disrespecting them. That’s my own thing; I am not judging anyone else."
Article Summary: Varun chakravarthy opened up about his relationship with money, revealing how he struggles with the guilt of spending on luxury items. The 34-year-old spinner shared a story of buying an expensive watch. "i have this guilty feeling that if i spend so much, if i have a watch worth rs 30 lakh or 40 lakh, that amount of money actually can change someone's life for two or three generations"

Article Title: Fred Warner and wife Sydney melt hearts with adorable gender reveal of baby No. 2 amid past week’s unfortunate events
Article Text:
Fred Warner and wife Sydney share emotional baby news (Credits: Instagram/@sydneywarner)

Fred Warner’s injury setback turns into a season of new beginnings



Fred and Sydney Warner embrace a new chapter with baby No. 2



San Francisco 49ers star linebacker Fred Warner may be sidelined for the season, but his heart is fuller than ever. Just days after suffering a devastating ankle injury, Warner and his wife, Sydney, shared some joyful news that instantly lifted spirits across the 49ers community — they’re expecting a baby girl.Fred Warner’s 2025 season came to a painful halt last Sunday after he fractured and dislocated his right ankle in a brutal collision against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. The All-Pro linebacker underwent surgery earlier this week and took to social media to thank fans for their unwavering support.While recovery will take time, Warner has plenty of motivation waiting at home. His wife Sydney, who’s been by his side through every challenge, shared a touching moment that melted hearts — a cozy photo of Fred resting on the couch with their 1-year-old son, Beau. But that wasn’t the only moment of warmth.In a beautiful video shared in her instagram, the couple revealed the gender of their second baby in the sweetest way possible. Standing beside Fred and little Beau, Sydney wrote, “Life knew we were gonna need a little extra sunshine this year 🤍 let’s hope Beau warms up to the idea soon enough 😜 sweet days are ahead 🙏🏽.”As the couple bit into cupcakes, the pink filling confirmed it — they’re having a baby girl.Fred’s overjoyed reaction was pure magic, though it gave Beau a little fright before he burst into tears.Fred and Sydney, who welcomed Beau during the 2024 offseason, are now preparing for another exciting adventure. Sydney is due in early 2026, and the couple couldn’t be more thrilled. Fred will soon join teammates Brock Purdy and Christian McCaffrey in the “girl dad” club — a badge of honor that’s sure to bring him new inspiration as he heals.Though the injury ended his season early, Warner’s story now carries a silver lining. As he cheers for his team from home during the 49ers’ upcoming game against the Atlanta Falcons, he’ll also be surrounded by love, laughter, and the promise of new life — a reminder that even in tough times, the sweetest victories happen off the field.Also Read: Is Mark Sanchez’s silence about his broadcasting comeback hinting at a bigger story behind the stabbing incident?
Article Summary: Fred warner and his wife, sydney, are expecting a baby girl in early 2026. The couple welcomed their son, beau, during the 2024 offseason. Warner suffered a devastating ankle injury against the tampa bay buccaneers last sunday. The all-pro linebacker underwent surgery earlier this week.
